game_data.current_text: As you draw closer to the throne, a faint scent of forgotten incense wafts up from the cracks in its surface. Faint symbols etched into the stone beneath seem to pulse with a soft, blue light. The air around the throne appears to ripple, as if something is trying to emerge from the very fabric of the chair itself.

history.choice: Approach and inspect the damaged throne

choices.text: Attempt to sit on the throne and see what happens
Investigate the symbols etched into the stone beneath the throne
Call out for anyone who may be present in the hall, hoping to spark a response
Reach out to touch the pulsing symbols, feeling an inexplicable connection to them
